name: Unbalanced (NotJoshuaa)
description:
This is a short prototype platformer style game.  We created it during Ludum Dare 49! 

Everything in the game was created by us, even the music! The only thing that was not made by us, was the font "Sci-fied".

Making this short prototype was a very good experience, it built our relationships with our team members, allowing for us to communicate better, it was almost like an icebreaker! 

LIST OF MEMBERS WHO WORKED ON THE GAME 

  1. Kristopher Caulfield
  2. Josh Devlin (ME)
  3. JJ Burke
  4. Paulina Grubyte
  5. Niall Dunlop 
  6. Francis Clenaghan

ULSTER UNIVERSITY IS BETTER THAN QUEENS UNIVERSITY

If you enjoyed our mechanics, leave a comment letting us know! We know that they can be improved, but for our first game jam we were really impressed with out ability to add in all of the mechanics into a small prototype. Any feedback at all is appreciated, but the game will not be continued or updated from the date that it has been put on the website as it was simply a prototype.
